<p>title: FastAPIä¸SQLAlchemyæ•°æ®åº“é›†æˆ<br>

<p>excerpt:<br>
FastAPIä¸SQLAlchemyçš„é›†æˆé€šè¿‡åˆ›å»ºè™šæ‹Ÿç¯å¢ƒã€å®‰è£…ä¾èµ–ã€é…ç½®æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥ã€å®šä¹‰æ•°æ®æ¨¡å‹å’Œå®ç°è·¯ç”±æ¥å®Œæˆã€‚æ ¸å¿ƒæ¨¡å—åŒ…æ‹¬æ•°æ®åº“å¼•æ“ã€ä¼šè¯å·¥å‚å’Œå£°æ˜æ€§åŸºç±»ã€‚æ•°æ®æ¨¡å‹é€šè¿‡SQLAlchemyå®šä¹‰ï¼Œè·¯ç”±é€šè¿‡FastAPIå®ç°ï¼Œæ”¯æŒåˆ›å»ºå’ŒæŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·ã€‚æµ‹è¯•æ¥å£é€šè¿‡curlå‘½ä»¤è¿›è¡Œï¼Œå¸¸è§æŠ¥é”™åŒ…æ‹¬è¡¨ä¸å­˜åœ¨ã€è¯·æ±‚ä½“éªŒè¯é”™è¯¯å’Œä¼šè¯ä¸å¯ç”¨ã€‚é«˜çº§é…ç½®æ¶‰åŠè¿æ¥æ± ä¼˜åŒ–å’Œå•å…ƒæµ‹è¯•ã€‚</p>

<li>å•å…ƒæµ‹è¯•</li>

<p>æ‰«æ<a href="https://static.amd794.com/blog/images/cmdragon_cn.png" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">äºŒç»´ç </a>å…³æ³¨æˆ–è€…å¾®ä¿¡æœä¸€æœï¼š<code>ç¼–ç¨‹æ™ºåŸŸ å‰ç«¯è‡³å…¨æ ˆäº¤æµä¸æˆé•¿</code></p>
<p><a href="https://tools.cmdragon.cn/zh/apps?category=ai_chat" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">æ¢ç´¢æ•°åƒä¸ªé¢„æ„å»ºçš„ AI åº”ç”¨ï¼Œå¼€å¯ä½ çš„ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªä¼Ÿå¤§åˆ›æ„</a></p>
<h1 id="1-fastapiä¸sqlalchemyåŒæ­¥æ•°æ®åº“é›†æˆå®æˆ˜">1. FastAPIä¸SQLAlchemyåŒæ­¥æ•°æ®åº“é›†æˆå®æˆ˜</h1>
<h2 id="11-é¡¹ç›®åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸ä¾èµ–å®‰è£…">1.1 é¡¹ç›®åˆå§‹åŒ–ä¸ä¾èµ–å®‰è£…</h2>
<p>åœ¨é¡¹ç›®æ ¹ç›®å½•æ‰§è¡Œä»¥ä¸‹å‘½ä»¤åˆ›å»ºè™šæ‹Ÿç¯å¢ƒå¹¶å®‰è£…ä¾èµ–ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">python -m venv venv
source venv/bin/activate  # Linux/Mac
venv\Scripts\activate.bat  # Windows
pip install fastapi sqlalchemy uvicorn
</code></pre>
<h2 id="12-æ•°æ®åº“é…ç½®æ ¸å¿ƒæ¨¡å—">1.2 æ•°æ®åº“é…ç½®æ ¸å¿ƒæ¨¡å—</h2>
<p>åˆ›å»º<code>database.py</code>æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">from sqlalchemy import create_engine
from sqlalchemy.ext.declarative import declarative_base
from sqlalchemy.orm import sessionmaker

# æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥é…ç½®ï¼ˆä½¿ç”¨SQLiteç¤ºä¾‹ï¼‰
SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URL = "sqlite:///./test.db"

# åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“å¼•æ“ï¼ˆå…³é—­SQLiteè¿æ¥æ± æ£€æŸ¥ï¼‰
engine = create_engine(
    SQLALCHEMY_DATABASE_URL,
    connect_args={"check_same_thread": False}
)

# ä¼šè¯å·¥å‚ï¼ˆå…³é—­è‡ªåŠ¨æäº¤ï¼Œå¯ç”¨è‡ªåŠ¨åˆ·æ–°ï¼‰
SessionLocal = sessionmaker(
    autocommit=False,
    autoflush=False,
    bind=engine
)

# å£°æ˜æ€§åŸºç±»
Base = declarative_base()


def get_db():
    """æ•°æ®åº“ä¼šè¯ä¾èµ–ç”Ÿæˆå™¨"""
    db = SessionLocal()
    try:
        yield db
    finally:
        db.close()
</code></pre>
<h2 id="13-æ•°æ®æ¨¡å‹å®šä¹‰">1.3 æ•°æ®æ¨¡å‹å®šä¹‰</h2>
<p>åˆ›å»º<code>models.py</code>æ–‡ä»¶ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">from sqlalchemy import Column, Integer, String
from database import Base


class User(Base):
    __tablename__ = "users"

    id = Column(Integer, primary_key=True, index=True)
    name = Column(String(50), nullable=False)
    email = Column(String(100), unique=True, index=True)
</code></pre>
<h2 id="14-ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥ä¸è·¯ç”±é›†æˆ">1.4 ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥ä¸è·¯ç”±é›†æˆ</h2>
<p>åœ¨<code>main.py</code>ä¸­å®ç°ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">from fastapi import FastAPI, Depends
from sqlalchemy.orm import Session
from models import User
from database import get_db, engine
from pydantic import BaseModel

# åˆå§‹åŒ–æ•°æ®åº“è¡¨ç»“æ„
Base.metadata.create_all(bind=engine)

app = FastAPI()


# Pydanticè¯·æ±‚æ¨¡å‹
class UserCreate(BaseModel):
    name: str
    email: str


@app.post("/users/")
def create_user(
        user: UserCreate,
        db: Session = Depends(get_db)
):
    """åˆ›å»ºç”¨æˆ·è·¯ç”±"""
    db_user = User(**user.dict())
    db.add(db_user)
    db.commit()
    db.refresh(db_user)
    return db_user


@app.get("/users/{user_id}")
def read_user(
        user_id: int,
        db: Session = Depends(get_db)
):
    """è·å–ç”¨æˆ·è¯¦æƒ…"""
    user = db.query(User).filter(User.id == user_id).first()
    return user
</code></pre>
<h2 id="15-è¿è¡Œä¸æµ‹è¯•">1.5 è¿è¡Œä¸æµ‹è¯•</h2>
<p>å¯åŠ¨æœåŠ¡ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash">uvicorn main:app --reload
</code></pre>
<p>æµ‹è¯•æ¥å£ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-bash"># åˆ›å»ºç”¨æˆ·
curl -X POST "http://localhost:8000/users/" \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{"name":"John Doe","email":"john@example.com"}'

# æŸ¥è¯¢ç”¨æˆ·
curl "http://localhost:8000/users/1"
</code></pre>
<h2 id="16-è¯¾åquiz">1.6 è¯¾åQuiz</h2>
<p><strong>é—®é¢˜1ï¼š</strong> å½“æ•°æ®åº“æŸ¥è¯¢è¿”å›Noneæ—¶ï¼Œå¦‚ä½•ä¼˜åŒ–APIå“åº”ï¼Ÿ</p>
<p><strong>ç­”æ¡ˆè§£æï¼š</strong> æ¨èä½¿ç”¨FastAPIçš„HTTPExceptionè¿”å›404çŠ¶æ€ç ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">from fastapi import HTTPException


@app.get("/users/{user_id}")
def read_user(user_id: int, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    user = db.query(User).filter(User.id == user_id).first()
    if not user:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="User not found")
    return user
</code></pre>
<p><strong>é—®é¢˜2ï¼š</strong> å¦‚ä½•å®ç°æ•°æ®åº“äº‹åŠ¡å›æ»šï¼Ÿ</p>
<p><strong>ç­”æ¡ˆè§£æï¼š</strong> åœ¨ä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥ä¸­ä½¿ç”¨try-exceptå—ï¼š</p>
<pre><code class="language-python">@app.post("/orders/")
def create_order(db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    try:
        # æ•°æ®åº“æ“ä½œ
        db.commit()
    except Exception as e:
        db.rollback()
        raise HTTPException(status_code=500, detail=str(e))
</code></pre>
<h2 id="17-å¸¸è§æŠ¥é”™å¤„ç†">1.7 å¸¸è§æŠ¥é”™å¤„ç†</h2>
<p><strong>æŠ¥é”™1ï¼š</strong> <code>sqlalchemy.exc.OperationalError: (sqlite3.OperationalError) no such table: users</code></p>
<p><strong>è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼š</strong></p>
<ol>
<li>ç¡®è®¤å·²æ‰§è¡Œ<code>Base.metadata.create_all(bind=engine)</code></li>
<li>æ£€æŸ¥æ•°æ®åº“æ–‡ä»¶è·¯å¾„æ˜¯å¦æ­£ç¡®</li>
<li>åˆ é™¤æ—§æ•°æ®åº“æ–‡ä»¶é‡æ–°ç”Ÿæˆ</li>
</ol>
<p><strong>æŠ¥é”™2ï¼š</strong> <code>pydantic.error_wrappers.ValidationError: 1 validation error</code></p>
<p><strong>è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼š</strong></p>
<ol>
<li>æ£€æŸ¥è¯·æ±‚ä½“æ˜¯å¦ä¸Pydanticæ¨¡å‹å®šä¹‰åŒ¹é…</li>
<li>éªŒè¯å­—æ®µç±»å‹å’Œçº¦æŸæ¡ä»¶</li>
<li>ä½¿ç”¨curlæµ‹è¯•æ—¶æ·»åŠ <code>-H "Content-Type: application/json"</code></li>
</ol>
<p><strong>æŠ¥é”™3ï¼š</strong> <code>RuntimeError: Session is not available</code></p>
<p><strong>è§£å†³æ–¹æ¡ˆï¼š</strong></p>
<ol>
<li>ç¡®è®¤è·¯ç”±å‡½æ•°æ­£ç¡®ä½¿ç”¨Depends(get_db)</li>
<li>æ£€æŸ¥æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥é…ç½®æ˜¯å¦æ­£ç¡®</li>
<li>ç¡®ä¿æ²¡æœ‰åœ¨è·¯ç”±å¤–ç›´æ¥è°ƒç”¨get_db()</li>
</ol>
<h2 id="18-é«˜çº§é…ç½®æŠ€å·§">1.8 é«˜çº§é…ç½®æŠ€å·§</h2>
<h3 id="è¿æ¥æ± ä¼˜åŒ–">è¿æ¥æ± ä¼˜åŒ–</h3>
<pre><code class="language-python"># é…ç½®MySQLè¿æ¥æ± ç¤ºä¾‹
engine = create_engine(
    "mysql+pymysql://user:password@localhost/dbname",
    pool_size=20,
    max_overflow=0,
    pool_recycle=3600
)
</code></pre>
<h3 id="è¯·æ±‚ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸç¤ºæ„å›¾">è¯·æ±‚ç”Ÿå‘½å‘¨æœŸç¤ºæ„å›¾</h3>
<pre><code>å®¢æˆ·ç«¯è¯·æ±‚ -&gt; è·¯ç”±å¤„ç† -&gt; åˆ›å»ºæ•°æ®åº“ä¼šè¯ -&gt; ä¸šåŠ¡å¤„ç† -&gt; æäº¤äº‹åŠ¡ -&gt; å…³é—­ä¼šè¯
                      â”‚                      â”‚
                      â””â”€â”€ å¼‚å¸¸æ—¶å›æ»šäº‹åŠ¡ â”€â”€â”€â”€â”˜
</code></pre>
<h3 id="å•å…ƒæµ‹è¯•é…ç½®">å•å…ƒæµ‹è¯•é…ç½®</h3>
<pre><code class="language-python"># æµ‹è¯•ç”¨ä¾‹ç¤ºä¾‹
from fastapi.testclient import TestClient


def test_create_user():
    client = TestClient(app)
    response = client.post("/users/", json={
        "name": "Test User",
        "email": "test@example.com"
    })
    assert response.status_code == 200
    assert "id" in response.json()
</code></pre>

<li><a href="https://blog.cmdragon.cn/posts/3b96477f5460/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">FastAPIä¾èµ–æ³¨å…¥ï¼šå‚æ•°å…±äº«ä¸é€»è¾‘å¤ç”¨ | cmdragon's Blog</a></li>
<li><a href="https://blog.cmdragon.cn/posts/1d6d61c6ff85/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">FastAPIå®‰å…¨é˜²æŠ¤æŒ‡å—ï¼šæ„å»ºåšä¸å¯æ‘§çš„å‚æ•°å¤„ç†ä½“ç³» | cmdragon's Blog</a></li>
<li><a href="https://blog.cmdragon.cn/posts/63d68d803116/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">FastAPIå¤æ‚æŸ¥è¯¢ç»ˆææŒ‡å—ï¼šå‘Šåˆ«if-elseçš„ç°ä»£åŒ–è¿‡æ»¤æ¶æ„ | cmdragon's Blog</a></li>
<li><a href="https://blog.cmdragon.cn/posts/6a3cba67a72d/" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">FastAPI æ ¸å¿ƒæœºåˆ¶ï¼šåˆ†é¡µå‚æ•°çš„å®ç°ä¸æœ€ä½³å®è·µ | cmdragon's Blog</a></li>
